name: ecotone (itch)
description: Ecotone is a platform game with a changing gameplay which provide puzzle and skill phases. The game invite the player into a quirky world, and features a unique, dreamlike and mysterious atmosphere. In the strange Ecotone's world, you will embody a weird character with a story to discover. As this character passes each level, he will earn some new skills. But beware, the environment is full of strange creatures, and some of them may not like you.
